name: Accordion
description: Accordion component for collapsible content sections. Supports both exclusive (single-open) and multi-open modes.

props.name: items
props.description: Items with id, title, content, disabled

props.name: exclusive
props.description: If true, only one expanded at a time

examples.title: Basic Accordion

migrationExamples.designSystem:
import { Accordion } from '@/components';
<Accordion items={[{ id: '1', title: 'Title', content: 'Content' }]} />
migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Accordion+Summary+Details with data-driven Accordion

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Enter/Space toggles sections, Tab navigates between headers
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Expanded/collapsed state and section title announced

whenNotToUse: For tabs with equal content (use Tabs instead)
bestPractices: Use exclusive mode for FAQ-style content
